profile: WOW 1 DAY PAINTING Toronto Northwest (TNW) is changing the interior and exterior painting industry. We employ experienced, professional painters and unique systems to complete most residential and many commercial painting projects in just one day. Enjoy the quality you expect in a timeline that's unexpected.
products: Interior and exterior painting. Wallpaper removal and hanging. Some dry wall repair.
services:
WOW 1 DAY PAINTING in the Greater Toronto Area's northwest region* proudly serves your local residential and commercial painting needs. 

*Milton, Halton Hills, Brampton, Caledon, Orangeville, Bolton, Schomberg, Nobleton, Tottenham and more.
specialities:
Fully WSIB compliant plus full private insurance means we're fully accountable and you're fully covered at all times against the unexpected.

Which also means we charge tax ... yes, always.
payment_method: Bank transfer, most credit cards, cheque and cash (... yes, still including tax).
name: WOW 1 DAY PAINTING (Toronto Northwest)

Here at FV RENOVATIONS, we offer very competitive rates for our elite services.With customer satisfaction being our main priority, we pride ourselves in the belief that our job is not complete until our customers are fully satisfied.
​
At FV RENOVATIONS, we strive to excel in our service. So when you hire us, you can be confident that you will receive the personal touch that only our skilled team can offer.
 
OFFERING UNBEATABLE PRICES FOR TOP-QUALITY SERVICE

At FV RENOVATIONS, customer satisfaction is the ultimate responsibility of all our employees.
Our commitment is to provide excellent services that will excel far beyond your expectations.By maintaining strong and friendly communication with our customers,
we continue to enhance the value and quality of our work to ensure you are completely satisfied.
 
 
Client satisfaction is not just a goal for us - it is an action plan in progress.
​
We don’t just believe in it - we live by it!  
 
FV RENOVATIONS -"QUALITY IS OUR STANDARD"

profile:
Serving Toronto and the GTA , proudly ,with over 20 years experience on the business.
When you choose Santos Painting you're choosing for a quality job.
We take care of our customers like any other company and we really respect your home.
Our main goal and our number one rule is to make our customers happy and we'll go above and beyond to give the customer satisfaction that you deserve.
We are very proud in saying that we never had an unhappy customer till this day and we don't plan to start now.

***

We specialize in both Residential and Commercial Painting: Interior painting, Exterior painting, plaster repair, drywall repair and installation,condo painting, townhouse painting, stucco ceiling flattening,wallpaper removal, kitchen cabinet painting, kitchen cabinet spraying, staircase painting, staircase staining, exterior wood repair, aluminum siding painting, brick painting, deck staining, fence painting, interior caulking, storefront painting, office painting.

***

Contact us today to schedule an appointment. We're looking forward to give you the best paint job you can get.

profile:
ABOUT US
Ellis Wall Finishes is a well-established local company located in Toronto and its vicinities. We offer high quality and professional painting, decorative wall finishes and venetian plaster services.

 

We have the experience, expertise and dedication to get your job done right and delivered on time and on budget. Our employees are certified and offer professional services on diverse projects.

​

Our priority is customer satisfaction and for this reason, we use only the best quality paints and materials on the market. Completing the project in a timely and efficient manner ensuring the highest standards is top priority for Ellis Wall Finishes.

​

We provide a free onsite or remote estimate and initial consultation to ensure that we are the right fit for you and your house or business.
services:
PAINTING

DECORATIVE WALL FINISHES

VENETIAN PLASTER
name: Ellis Wall Finishes

profile:
At Five Star Painting, our mission is to help you transform your property through paint while delivering the very best in quality and customer service. Our goal is to help you create the space of your dreams. We do this by providing the very highest quality products and working directly with you to capture your vision. 

We strive for nothing less than 100% customer satisfaction.  With every project, we thoroughly prep and clean all surfaces prior to painting. Our painters work quickly, efficiently, and carefully to complete the job in a timely manner. Throughout the process, we remain in consistent communication with you to ensure that your expectations are not only met but exceeded.

Give us a call for a free paint estimate: 
(289)769-8747

profile:
Hey! Arran MacDonald here. Thank you for taking the time to check out our business. 

I began painting in university for a local business while I was finishing my bachelors degree. I quickly gained a passion for providing exceptional results for my clients. There is no better feeling than producing a product that a client loves. That is what I love to do! 

Here at HECRA, we pride ourselves on not only providing exceptional results, but providing our clients with tremendous customer service. 

You matter. We value you and your happiness. We believe that open communication and honesty lead to the BEST service experience. Please do not hestiate to ask questions or express concerns. WE WANT YOU TO BE HAPPY!

We look forward to working with you!

profile:
Welcome TC Contracting 

We offer many Services:

Retaining walls: TC Contracting are specialist in Armour stone, interlock and Pre cast concrete retaining walls.  Whether its aesthetic, or structural  needs, TC Contracting has the skills and knowledge to complete the task. Contact us with your ideas and watch us bring them to reality. 

Full Landscaping , Interlock, Concrete: We know you work hard to see your dream property come to reality. Here at TC, we will work with you to make sure the job is done properly and in a timely matter

Fencing: To dig and set post to complete fencing jobs. From 10 feet to a 1000 feet .  TC has the capabilities to finish your project. Many different fencing designs available, contact us to get started 
Decks: There are many options when it comes to decks IE: Wood type, railings, Steps, Levels ECT. Let TC Contracting's team help you figure out which options are suited best for you!  

Excavation and Trenching: Are you looking for a trusted contractor to excavate your next  project? There are many laws and regulations surrounding excavating and digging. Let us explain what needs to be done and leave it with TC so you are confident  that your job is being done right.  Each and every time!

Gravel Driveways and Sodding: Looking to give your property a beautiful new look? TC Contracting are experts at gravel driveways and sod. We work with our partners to guarantee the best materials at the best prices.
name: TC contracting
